name: Planet Toss
description:
htc VIVE required!!

Objective: Throw planets at galaxies to earn points. The larger the planet the more drag it has.

Red Galaxies- 1 Point

Green Galaxies - 2 Points

Purple Galaxies- 5 Points

Consecutive galaxies hit with single planet throw receive score multiplier.

***Note*** Planets must be picked up and thrown to receive points.

Controls- Hold trigger to pick up planets, release trigger to throw
